messages.message: Hi all, creating an app fails for me on the aihub.dev (http://aihub.dev) sandbox (tried multiple times). Error in network tab: `"status": "ERROR", "msg": "Failed to create the app. Error: Error occurred executing GRPC method: Request /repo_service.RepoService/CreateDeployedSolution failed. Error code=INTERNAL, Error=(13, 'internal'), Message: Error adding solution. Non-retriable error.."}], "cur_status": "{\"msg\": \"Adding to the database\"}"`

there’s an error in `core-platform-service` logs about a duplicate entry (ie you’ve already created this app name and version before)
```"SQL DB: Error 1062 (23000): Duplicate entry 'test-0.0.1' for key 'deployed_solutions.deployed_solutions_name_version_uc'" operation="db/session/TxImpl.Exec" table="deployed_solutions" query_type="insert" trace_id="e0239f9b4a0f2f42"```
can you use a different app name and inspect what error message you get from the task for creating the app?
using a different app name works!

ok! i assume you got some different error message the first time you tried to publish your `test` app

so please report if you can’t create an app again
we should probably surface this particular error message rather than just say failed to create app
